casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Robert Dwayne LEWIS 141PA18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 19, 2018

Kathryn L. VandenBerg, Assistant Appellant Defender, Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender, For Lewis, Robert Dwayne

Milind Kumar Dongre, Attorney at Law, Susan I. Doyle, District Attorney, For State of North Carolina

Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General

Thomas J. Campbell, Assistant Attorney General

The following order has been entered on the Joint Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 13th of December 2018:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 19th of December 2018."

Defendant and State of NC shall have up to and including the 6th day of February 2019 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
